name: The Murder of Beppi the Clown the Dating Sim
name_original: The Murder of Beppi the Clown the Dating Sim
description:
Please do not take anything from this seriously. This is a sequel fangame  to Beppi the Clown Dating Simulator.  

There's a killer on the loose!

After murdering Studio MDHR's beloved Beppi the Clown, three witnesses try to help solve the case! Can you find them? Will you find them? 

There's 11 endings in total!

My rating for this is older teens and up.

[Content warnings: Guns, knives, murder, sexual implications, nonsense]

We have guest art! Follow these two for more!

@buniberi for 2 ending screens with Baroness Von Bon Bon and King Dice!

@scribblemakes for a shocking end screen with King Dice!
